document.full_text: greek finance minister george papaconstantinou suggested on monday that the eu and the imf give greece more time to repay its bailout funds, and at a cheaper rate, to allow it to exit its severe debt crisis.
document.title: greek finmin suggests eu/imf repayment extension
lines_and_colors: greek finance minister george papaconstantinou suggested on monday that the eu and the imf give greece more time to repay its bailout funds, and at a cheaper rate, to allow it to exit its severe debt crisis.
